Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface CustomerDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomerDAO
public interface CustomerDAOInterface
Interface for Customer Data Access Object (DAO) operations

  • Method Details

    • registerCustomer

      void registerCustomer(Customer customer)
      Registers a new customer in the system
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer to be registered

    • getCustomerIdByLoginCreds

      String getCustomerIdByLoginCreds(String username, String password)
      Retrieves the customer ID based on login credentials
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the customer
      password - The password of the customer
      Returns:
      The customer ID if found, else null

    • authenticateCustomer

      boolean authenticateCustomer(String username, String password)
      Authenticates a customer based on login credentials
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the customer
      password - The password of the customer
      Returns:
      True if authentication is successful, else false

    • updateCustomerInfo

      void updateCustomerInfo(String name, String email, String username, String password, String customerId)
      Updates customer information in the database
      Parameters:
      name - The updated name of the customer
      email - The updated email of the customer
      username - The updated username of the customer
      password - The updated password of the customer
      customerId - The ID of the customer whose information needs to be updated
